summary: Completed testing of ZWAP! Coin PWA Admin Account Settings feature. All 11 backend tests passed (100%). All 12 frontend UI tests passed. The feature is fully functional.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/admin/account/settings returns admin settings (email, notifications, last_login, key_last_changed) - PASSED
Backend: PUT /api/admin/account/settings updates admin email and notification preferences - PASSED
Backend: POST /api/admin/account/change-key changes admin key successfully - PASSED
Backend: verify_admin authenticates against BOTH env var AND database-stored hash - PASSED
Backend: Invalid/missing admin key returns 401 - PASSED
Backend: New key too short (<12 chars) returns 400 error - PASSED
Backend: Wrong current key returns 401 - PASSED
Backend: New key can be used to authenticate after change - PASSED
Backend: key_last_changed timestamp updated after key change - PASSED
Backend: Dual auth - env var key works - PASSED
Backend: Dual auth - database hash works - PASSED
Frontend: /admin page loads with login screen - PASSED
Frontend: Login with 'zwap-admin-2025-secure' key works - PASSED
Frontend: Admin panel has 'Account' tab visible in navigation - PASSED
Frontend: Account tab shows 'Change Admin Key' section - PASSED
Frontend: Change key section has current key, new key, confirm key fields - PASSED
Frontend: Change Admin Key button present - PASSED
Frontend: Account tab shows 'Admin Email & Notifications' section - PASSED
Frontend: Email input field present - PASSED
Frontend: Notification toggle (Enabled/Disabled) present - PASSED
Frontend: Save Settings button works - shows 'Settings saved' toast - PASSED
Frontend: Key validation - mismatched passwords shows error - PASSED
Frontend: Key validation - minimum length shows error - PASSED
critical_code_review_comments: Admin key is properly hashed with SHA-256 before storage (secure)
verify_admin dependency correctly implements dual authentication (env var + database hash)
admin_key_hash is never exposed in API responses (security correct)
last_login and key_last_changed timestamps properly tracked
data-testid attributes properly added for all interactive elements
Frontend validation for key length and mismatch works correctly
seed_data_creation: None - tests clean up after themselves
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin Account Settings feature fully tested and working. Key features verified: 1) GET/PUT /api/admin/account/settings for email and notifications 2) POST /api/admin/account/change-key with validation (12 char min, correct current key) 3) verify_admin dual auth (env var OR database hash) 4) Frontend Account tab at /admin with all sections and data-testid attributes 5) Save Settings and Change Admin Key buttons work correctly with proper toast messages
